price: Er weiß, was vor ihnen und was hinter ihnen liegt. Und zu Allah werden (all) die Angelegenheiten zurückgebracht.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamu mā bayna aydīhim wamā khalfahum wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
